update rss
rssId = #{rssId}, rssTitle = #{rssTitle}, rssUrl = #{rssUrl}, rssIcon = #{rssIcon}, fingePrint = #{fingePrint}, isSubscribe = #{isSubscribe}, updateTime = #{updateTime}, where 1 = 1 and rssId = #{rssId} ${condition}
mapper.delete: delete from rss where rssId in (${ids})
mapper.select: select * from rss a left join rss_crawl b on a.rssId = b.rssId where a.rssId = #{rssId} order by b.updateTime desc limit 0,3
select a.* from rss a left join rss_subscribe b on a.rssId = b.rssId LEFT JOIN rss_type c on b.rssTypeId = c.rssTypeId where c.userId = #{userId} order by a.updateTime desc limit #{startPage},#{page}
